title: How to Make Cauliflower Curry in Kashmiri Style

steps.headline: Keep aside the colander to remove the excess water.
Add oil, crushed black cardamom and cumin seeds.Sauté them.
Mix them and cook them in the natural juices.
Add oil in the large frying pan.Deep fry cauliflower florets.
Add the fried florets into the gravy.
Add some water and mix well.
Cover a lid on the frying pan and cook on a very low flame.
Keep stirring very carefully so that the florets are intact.

text: Cut cauliflower florets.  Clean and wash florets.  Keep aside the colander to remove the excess water.  Add oil, crushed black cardamom and cumin seeds.Sauté them.  Add onions and Sauté them.  Add tomatoes and Sauté.  Mix them and cook them in the natural juices.  Add salt and mix well.  Add Kashmiri Veri Masala. Mix well. Add turmeric powder.Mix well.  Add oil in the large frying pan.Deep fry cauliflower florets.  Add the fried florets into the gravy.  Add some water and mix well.  Cover a lid on the frying pan and cook on a very low flame.  Keep stirring very carefully so that the florets are intact.  Sprinkle the chopped coriander leaves.
